thread.title: Suyyash Rai, Kishwar Merchant to marry early next year
thread.title_full: Suyyash Rai, Kishwar Merchant to marry early next year

author: NewsWire
title: Suyyash Rai, Kishwar Merchant to marry early next year
text: 0 0 0 0 0 New Delhi, Oct 12 (IANS) Actors and real life couple Suyyash Rai and Kishwar Merchant, who have just entered the ninth season of “Bigg Boss” hosted by superstar Salman Khan, are planning to tie the knot by “January end or February next year”. “By January end or maybe February we are planning to get married…We are definately planning to get married so maybe when we come out (from the house), We will be busy planning for the wedding,” Suyyash told IANS over telephone from Lonavala, the hill station in the Western Ghats, some 80 km from Mumbai. The duo has planned to travel to foreign destinations after tying the knot. “After getting hitched madam (Kishwar Merchant) wants to go to Paris and Amsterdam, Moscow…So I have to plan all of that,” he added. “Big Boss Nau”, the ninth edition of the controversial reality TV show, also features Rimi Sen, Roopal Tyagi, Ankit Gera, Yuvika Chaudhary, Digangana Suryavanshi, Aman Verma, Vikas Bhalla, Arvind Vegda, Mandana Karimi, Rochelle Rao, Keith and Prince.
